NORTH SEA.
NORWAY.
DNC 20, DNC 21.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
   BY M/V WG AMUNDSEN TOWING 12 7000 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   60-29N 003-00E, 60-29N 003-58E,
   58-40N 003-58E, 59-00N 001-30E,
   59-00N 000-40E, 59-47N 000-40E,
   59-47N 002-02E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2043/17.
